src.java.evaluation

Class Evaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.java.evaluation.Evaluator

  • public class Evaluator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for loading a file that contains the relevance scores of the corpus and calculate the results for several evaluation and efficiency metrics such as mean precision, mean precision at rank 10, mean reciprocal rank mean query latency, mean query throughput, mean f-measure and mean recall.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs an Evaluator object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void calculateSystemMeasures(int minimumRelevance)
      Calculates the value of the several metrics, then asks the handler to take care of the results.

      • Evaluator

                 java.util.List<Query> queries,
                 EfficiencyMetricsHandler metricsHandler)
        Constructs an Evaluator object
        Parameters:
        relevanceFile - The name of the file that contains the relevance scores
        queries - A List of Query objects to store their respective results
        metricsHandler - A handler for the results

        public void calculateSystemMeasures(int minimumRelevance)
        Calculates the value of the several metrics, then asks the handler to take care of the results.
        Parameters:
